project.name: FPL League Hub
project.description: Fantasy Premier League analytics platform with Tableau-style design and ESPN-style breaking news

technology_stack.styling: Tailwind CSS + Custom Tableau-style inline styles
technology_stack.charts: Custom SVG implementation with line progression

features.rank_progression: ✅ Tableau-style SVG charts with line progression and right sidebar
features.squad_analysis: ✅ Enhanced table with real gameweek 2 data
features.pitch_view: ✅ Modal with proper formation layout (GK, DEF, MID, FWD)
features.crest_generation: ✅ Fans League system - Premier League badges based on first 3 letters
features.real_time_data: ✅ Connected to FPL API with caching

database_schema.teams: FPL team data with crest URLs

server_components: src/app/page.tsx - Home page with team search
client_components: src/app/league/[id]/league-page-client.tsx - Interactive league dashboard with breaking news
src/components/charts/rank-progression-chart.tsx - Tableau-style SVG bump charts with line progression
services: src/services/fpl-api.ts - FPL API integration with caching
src/services/team-service.ts - Core business logic for teams and leagues
src/services/crest-service.ts - Team crest generation using Premier League badges

recent_improvements.tableau_redesign: Complete UI overhaul from FPL purple theme to clean Tableau-style white/gray design
recent_improvements.fans_league_system: Implemented Premier League crest mapping based on first 3 letters (kej→Newcastle, jog→Man United)
recent_improvements.svg_line_progression: Replaced static dots with interactive SVG line charts showing rank progression
recent_improvements.breaking_news_system: Built ESPN-style auto-generated headlines: Biggest Climber, Captaincy Masterstroke, Bench Blunder, Rivalry Watch
recent_improvements.layout_restructure: Team selector moved to top right, team list moved to right sidebar with crests
recent_improvements.all_teams_included: Now displays all 22 teams from league 150789 instead of limiting to top 20
recent_improvements.top3_removal: Removed redundant top 3 teams card section for cleaner layout

performance_optimizations.caching: Redis caching for all FPL API calls with fallback to in-memory storage
performance_optimizations.database: SQLite with Prisma for fast local queries
performance_optimizations.api_efficiency: Batch processing of squad analysis for multiple teams
performance_optimizations.client_side: Proper separation of server and client components for optimal rendering

working_features: League standings with rank change arrows
Squad analysis with real gameweek points
Tableau-style SVG rank progression charts with line progression
Fans League Premier League crest system (first 3 letters mapping)
ESPN-style breaking news with auto-generated headlines
Right sidebar team list with scrolling

design_system.spacing: Clean margins and padding following 8px grid
design_system.shadows: Subtle box shadows for card elevation
